subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Glasgow Rangers midfielder DaMarcus Beasley was added to the United States roster for next week’s World Cup qualifier in Guatemala, the first game in the semifinal round of the North and Central American and Caribbean region. The United States is trying to qualify for its sixth consecutive World Cup. The top two teams advance to next year’s regional finals.
